article_title: Healthcare In The 10 Candidates' Own Words

article_metadata.description: This political season is unusual in terms of the divergence of views held by the field of 17 GOP candidates. Where they are all unified is in a universal call for the repeal of The Affordable Care Act (ACA), more commonly known as Obamacare. However their moment of unity is fleeting as they [...]
article_metadata.author: Steve Brozak
